series.name: 30-Year Fixed Mortgage Rate
series.description: This chart represents the average interest rate for a 30-year fixed mortgage in the United States, influencing borrowing costs.

series.name: Housing Starts
series.description: This chart shows the number of new residential construction projects that have started, indicating future housing supply.

series.name: Building Permits
series.description: This chart tracks the number of new private housing units authorized by building permits, a key indicator of future housing construction.

series.name: Homeownership Rate
series.description: This chart indicates the percentage of homes occupied by their owners. A higher rate suggests greater market stability.
